name: 你很聪明吗？
description:
A puzzle leisure game.
Command the hero to make strategic moves, find the ultimate treasure, and achieve victory.
Are you truly intelligent? Try to clear the levels to prove yourself.

The game features over 40 regular levels and 20 challenging levels.
Various enemies with different effects await your exploration.
Achieve victory by reaching the treasure chest amidst the monsters' encirclement.

Gameplay:
Use the mouse to command the hero and villagers, adjust the positions of monsters to reach the treasure.
